snippet: A federal judge sentenced Viktor Bout to the mandatory minimum of 25 years for conspiring to kill Americans.
abstract: Russian Viktor Bout is sentenced in Federal District Court in Manhattan to 25 years in prison for conspiring to kill Americans by agreeing to sell weapons to federal informants he believed were members of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; federal prosecutors had sought a life sentence for Bout, believed to play a leadership role in international weapons trafficking.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge sentenced Viktor Bout to the mandatory minimum of 25 years for conspiring to kill Americans.

headline.seo: Russian Arms Dealer Is Sentenced to 25 Years
headline.main: Russian Weapons Trafficker Avoids Getting Life in Prison
headline.print_headline: Weapons Dealer Is Spared a Life Term
